author: dancojocaru2000
body:
For example, I prefer using [`exa`](https://the.exa.website/) instead of `ls` or `Get-ChildItem`. I therefore wrote the following line in my PowerShell profile:

```powershell
New-Alias -Name ls -Value exa
```

However, when I run `ls` after that, the output doesn't contain colors. The output does contain colors when running `exa` directly.

Does alias affect isatty detection (which I suspect might be the culprit)?

comments.author: daxian-dbw
dancojocaru2000
comments.body: ...apparently it fixed itself. On one hand, great, not a problem anymore. On the other hand, sorry for disturbing.

title: Running command through alias does not display colors
